DOC.brief_summary: A ONE YEAR SAFETY STUDY FOR PATIENTS WHO COMPLETE STUDY VAA489A2201.
DOC.brief_title: One Year Study to Evaluate the Safety of the Combination of Valsartan and Amlodipine in Patients With Hypertension
DOC.criteria: SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF VAA489A2201 CORE TRIAL VISIT 7 BLOOD PRESSURE MUST BE MSDBP ≤ 95 mmHg AND MSSBP ≤ 150 mmHg PATIENTS WHO EXPERIENCED ANY ADVERSE EVENTS CONSIDERED SERIOUS AND DRUG RELATED IN VAA489A2201 CORE Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
